articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Ray Stevenson – RRR, Thor and Star Wars actor – dies aged 58 - The Guardian
articles.description: Northern Irish actor, who often played warriors in productions including Rome and Vikings, was hospitalised suddenly while filming in Italy
articles.content: Ray Stevenson, the Northern Irish actor who played the villainous British governor in RRR, Volstagg in the Thor films and a main antagonist in the upcoming Star Wars series Ahsoka, has died aged 58.… [+5415 chars]
